Author: lotsofsqs
Text: Right now at work: two dozen chocolate chip cookies, several boxes of chocolates, a five gallon tin of popcorn (cheese, buttered, caramel), several pounds of cheeses and meats, crackers, chips and salsa, caramels, coworkers joking about how they’re gonna get fat.  This is just the start. We are expecting to receive, based on years past, several dozen more cookies, a full catered meal, cashews, chocolate covered almonds, lots of stuff I’m forgetting??? It’s hell.  Thank god we are also gifted many bottles of wine so I can get through it all... B)

Author: Fastingcametome
Text: Thats intense for anyone lol. Something about free food is so fucking stressful when u have an ed. And the sweets which are so bingeable. Im lucky that when we do get a bunch of extra snacks, theyre just there and no one cares if u dont eat them. Maybe u could gift the stuff u dont want to another department. And keep the best looking cookie ☺️
